roleset.name: acting for a cause, in (or like in) holy war

example.name: adjectival arg1
example.text: [I]t is Pakistan and not India which is the real target of the non-proliferation crusade."

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, WN eventive noun lexicon. No VNcls.

example.name: both args
example.text: Japan Takes A Prisoner In their Crusade to Plunder the Southern Ocean Whale Sanctuary.
example.arg: to Plunder the Southern Ocean Whale Sanctuary
